## What is a Soundpool?
 
A Soundpool is a collection of sounds and loops that are organized by genre, instrument, tempo, and mood. You can use them to create your own songs and tracks with MAGIX Music Maker or any other music software that supports WAV files. Each Soundpool contains hundreds of loops that are perfectly matched and can be combined in any way you want. You can also mix and match loops from different Soundpools to create unique soundscapes and mashups. The possibilities are endless!
